sentences.sContent: What are your major subject and minor subject?
sentences.sContent_eng: What are your major subject and minor subject?
sentences.sCn: 你的主修科目和辅修科目是什么?。

sentences.sContent: ...The kind of shopping－where you hand over notes and count out change in return－now happens only in the most minor of our retail encounters...
...People are more inclined to cry when suffering minor forms of depression...
...crying is more commonly associated with minor forms of depression than with major depression involving suicidal thoughts...
...There was damage to the mailboxes and minor damage to the truck...
...This caused minor damage to his truck and serious damage to the car...

synos.tran: 未成年的；次要的；较小的；小调的；二流的
未成年人；小调；副修科目

phrases.pCn: 小断层；轻微故障，次要故障
（耳鼻喉科门诊）小手术；小手术；小外科

remMethod.val: min(小) ＋ or(表人、 物) → 未成年人； 辅修； 参考： major(v. 主修)

words.tran: 少数民族；少数派；未成年

trans.tranOther: small and not very important or serious, especially when compared with other things
someone who is below the age at which they become legally responsible for their actions
